home.title: Welcome
home.text1: Agali Studios rental apartments are a family business started in 2025.
home.text2: They are located by the sea on the provincial road Aidipsos-Lichados, just a few minutes by car from the ports of Loutra Aidipsou or Agiokampos. In Loutra Aidipsou, you can do your shopping and go out for food and drinks.
home.text3: The accommodation has a total of 4 double apartments with balconies. They are all fully furnished and have everything a guest needs for a pleasant stay. From the balcony, you can enjoy the sea view, while in our garden you can sit at the gazebo next to the olive trees.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? Send us a message!
